pr_title: Fix FSM Unit Test and Snapshot Plugin Condition

timeline.message:
Fix FSM Unit Test and Snapshot Plugin Condition

- Fix Intermittent Failure on FSM Unit Test
- Fix onSnapshotEnd condition to check for an ack SNAPSHOT_END instead of SNAPSHOT_REPLICATED (intermediate acks)

Fix FSM Unit Test and Snapshot Plugin Condition

- Fix Intermittent Failure on FSM Unit Test
- Fix onSnapshotEnd condition to check for an ack SNAPSHOT_END instead of SNAPSHOT_REPLICATED (intermediate acks)

timeline.bodyText: nit - probably we should rename this to setter of something.. because it is only setting the metadata.
timeline.author: pankti-m

replies.bodyText: Yes, I had this comment on another PR and that PR is addressing it, so I'm not going to touch this here to not conflict.
replies.author: annym

timeline.bodyText: index is never getting updated.  will it ever reach the condition index<baseSnapshot?
timeline.author: pankti-m

timeline.bodyText: apply has not been done yet, right?  Only transfer has completed?
timeline.author: pankti-m

timeline.bodyText: default value will be false which can change the behavior.. is it intentional?
timeline.author: pankti-m

replies.bodyText: the static code analysis asks to remove this redundant. It is initialized in the constructor.
replies.author: annym
